channel.title: Language on XKZZZZZZ's Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Language on XKZZZZZZ's Lab

item.title: C++20 Ranges at First Glance
item.description: Since years before C++ 20’s release, I have been keeping a close eye on it. Many new features fairly tickle my fancy, among which are <ranges> and <format> library components. While there’s no available implementation for <format> yet, MSVC 16.8 and GCC-10 provides a usable <ranges> which I played with and writes the post for. My life highly involved closely with programming begins with a long period using C#. Among all the language features of C#, LINQ is the beloved one for me.
